# Welcome to Fast Brain Parcellation's documentation!

This tool performs a full brain parcellation based on T1-weighted (T1w) MRIs.
It uses MONAI ([https://monai.io/](https://monai.io/)) to perform inference with a full-resolution 3D model (3d_fullres) 
trained with MONAI's DynUNet.


```{toctree}
:caption: 'Contents:'
:maxdepth: 3

core/core_index.md
slicer_plugin/slicer_plugin.md
run_docker/run_docker.md

```
